_sText:
This map was created to honor Kiiru's & RambJoe's original map surf_sinister and hopefully we have created something even they could be proud of, also note that this map is as hard if not even harder than the original map so you might have a tough time before you beat it.
hope all of you enjoy!

(Also idk why but the screenshots are low-resolution.)

Thx alot to Juxtapo for making a video of the map and ofcourse Beetle for the surfdemos!
